message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%, but we can negotiate.
Your offer was quite aggressive, Alice. Let's be more realistic. I propose a 65/35 split in my favor.  Think carefully, the value decreases with each round.
I understand your perspective, Bob. Let's try a 45/55 split in my favor. This is a more reasonable compromise considering the decreasing value.
